text: The 2018 New Orleans Privateers baseball team represented the University of New Orleans (UNO) during the 2018 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Privateers played their home games at Maestri Field at Privateer Park as a member of the Southland Conference. They were led by head coach Blake Dean, in his 3rd season at UNO. ==Personnel== ===Coaching staff=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%;" |- ! Name !! Position !! Seasons at UNO!!
